post:
<h1>10 orders from now will get a free upgrade to 80GB in LA and Dallas SSD Cached.</h1>

**The Kicker**  

We have launched our new Los Angeles, CA location and added SSD Cached storage for our Dallas location.

**The SSD Cached Benchmark**
<pre>root@testssd:~# dd if=/dev/zero of=test bs=64k count=16k conv=fdatasync; unlink test  
16384+0 records in  
16384+0 records out  
1073741824 bytes (1.1 GB) copied, 1.84953 s, 581 MB/s</pre>

<pre>root@testssd:~/ioping-0.6# ./ioping -RD .

--- . (simfs /vz/private/621) ioping statistics ---
23473 requests completed in 3000.1 ms, 14471 iops, 56.5 mb/s
min/avg/max/mdev = 0.1/0.1/0.7/0.0 ms</pre>

**The Website**

http://vpsdime.com

**The Plan**

- OpenVZ Virtualization
- 4 vCPU
- **6GB Memory**
- 30GB HDD
- 2TB Monthly Traffic Limit
- **4Gbps Uplink** (4 x 1Gbps Load Balanced)
- 1 IPv4 Address
- No IPv6 at the moment
- Dallas, TX or Los Angeles, CA

**The Purchase Link**

https://vpsdime.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=1

**The Network Tests**

Dallas:

- Test IP: 192.211.62.100
- Test File: http://192.211.62.100/1000MB.test

LA:

- Test IP: 162.217.135.4
- Test File: http://162.217.135.4/1000MB.test

**The Node Specs**

- Dual E5 2620 or E5 2640v2 CPU
- 384GB Memory
- 8 x 10K Drives RAID10 or 4 x 4TB RAID10 + 4 x 240GB SSD RAID10 with Cachecade

**The AUP**

We do not allow

- BitTorrent
- TOR
- Public VPNs/Open Proxies
- MineCraft Servers
- CamFrog
- Digital Currency Mining
- llegal activity (SPAM, Port Scanning, DoS, etc.)

We do allow

- IRC
- Other gameservers such as steam
- Legal Adult

**Can I get more _____?**

No, however, we can combine 2 plans together.
